name: getCallLogMetricsDetails
description:
Call logs provide a record of all incoming and outgoing calls over Zoom Phone in an account. Use this API to list call log details of a specific call. **Prerequisites:** * Business, or Education account * Zoom Phone license

**Scopes:** `phone:read:admin`, `phone:write:admin`
**Rate Limit Label:** `Light`

call_id.description: Unique identifier of the phone call. The value of this field can be retrieved from [List Call Logs]() API.

$ul: **call_id**: Unique identifier of the phone call.
**callee**: Callee object contains information of the calee.
**codec**: Audio codec.
**device_type**: Device type.
**extension_number**: Full extension number of the callee.
**headset**: Headset used for the call by the callee.
**isp**: ISP.
**microphone**: Microphone used for the call by the callee.
**phone_number**: Phone number of the callee in E164 format.
**site_id**: Unique identifier of the [site](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360020809672-Managing-multiple-sites).
**caller**: Caller object contains information of the caller.
**codec**: Audio codec.
**device_type**: Device type.
**extension_number**: Full extension number of the caller.
**headset**: Headset used for the call by the caller.
**isp**: ISP.
**microphone**: Microphone used for the call by the caller.
**phone_number**: Phone number of the caller in E164 format.
**site_id**: Unique identifier of the [site](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360020809672-Managing-multiple-sites).
**date_time**: Date and time at which the call started.
**direction**: Direction of the call. The value of this field can be either `internal` or `outbound`.
**duration**: Duration of the call in seconds.

**mos**: Zoom uses Mean Opinion Score (MOS) as the main measurement to report on voice quality. MOS measures voice quality on a scale of 1 to 5. A score of 1 indicates unacceptable voice quality for all users. A score of 5 is the best voice quality.
